job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
POZENT is searching for Machine Learning Engineer to work remotely.

Location: New Jersey

Onsite Flexibility: 100% Remote

Job Description

Qualifications
  • - B.S or higher in Computer Science or similar (Engineering, Math, Physics) or equivalent software development experience
  • - A strong quantitative background (Probability Theory, Statistics, Linear Algebra, etc.)- Experience in data curation/cleansing, model evaluation, feature engineering, and dimensionality reduction
  • - 10 years of relevant industry experience
  • - Proven ability to develop, deploy, and maintain machine learning models in a production environment
  • - Experienced in writing high-quality pipeline and notebook code
  • - Fluent in Python and modern Client libraries like Scikit-Learn, PyTorch, Keras/Tensorflow
  • - Experienced in NLP models
  • - Familiarity with modern computational tools & infrastructure like AWS/GCP, Docker, Git
  • - Experience with distributed only systems and RESTful architectures
  • - Adept in ambiguous situations, flexible and comfortable making decisions using minimal available data
  • - Comfortable working independently with minimal supervision

Preferred Qualifications
  • Graph Neural Networks
